oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thomas Center Dedication
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings; De La Salle Christian Brothers; Dedications; Thomas Center;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: President Brother Malcolm O'Sullivan, Blanche Spain Thomas, and Douglass J. Thomas were photographed in from of the plaque at the dedication for the Thomas Center on November 13, 1971. The plaque indicated that the Center was dedicated "in loving memory of Florence Lincoln Thomas, mother of Douglass J. Thomas."

For all requests, please contact the Archives at archives@cbu.edu.
